title: Beautiful Upgraded 4-bedroom with Large Bedrooms & Bonus Loft
posting_body: Nicely upgraded 2-story 4-bedroom house for rent in Silverado Ranch.
Great location, just minutes from shopping centers, restaurants, schools, the new Costco and the M Resort Casino.
Built in 2005, this home features 4 bedrooms+Loft, 2.5 bathrooms and a 2-car garage.
Over 2,700 sqft of space with traditional layout featuring: formal living room, formal dining room and a separate family room with laminate wood floors, neutral colors, gas fireplace and a wet bar.
Upgraded gourmet kitchen with island, nook, granite countertops and black appliances.
Laundry room with washer and dryer.
All 4 bedrooms and spacious bonus loft are upstairs and featuring laminate flooring(no carpets at all).
Huge master suite with walk-in closet.
Dual sinks with separate shower and tub in master bath.
Good sized guest bedrooms with a shared bathroom.
Low maintenance desert landscaping in backyard with long covered patio.
Looking for a 1-year lease.
NO PETS please.
Available 7/31/2022
RENT: $2,700/mo.
DEPOSITS:
Security: $2,700
Cleaning: $300
App.fee: $75/person
Qualifications: Proof of income for 3x rent, clean verifiable rental history and 600+ credit score
For more info or to schedule a viewing please call Laszlo at
show contact info

Henderson - Green Valley - Seven Hills area buyer/leasing specialist
